component.documentation: Override default configuration for Nuxeo EP tree

extension.documentation:
Default configuration for the Nuxeo Correspondence tree.
Displays only Folderish objects (excluding CorrespondenceMailboxRoot), not marked as hidden in navigation, and sorts by dc:title property. Folders with the BigFolder facet are shown without any children.
